A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The only thing stronger than the Force will be audience reactions to the latest chapter. I never understood the \"gushing\" reviews of The Force Awakens. I found that entry a tired predictable retread.  This on the other hand was exciting\, fresh and intense.  The family and I loved it. Everyone will form their own opinions and offer critiques but I for one was so grateful that I didn't see the same archetype characters and see yet another Death Star get blown up.....
